Description: Wooden male figure with a shaven head(chipped); painted eyes and kilt; feet lost.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 231)
Condition: incomplete - feet lost; damage to the head
